# docker_container (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a Docker container.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get information about an existing container
data "docker_container" "my_container" {
  name = "my-container"
}

output "container_id" {
  value = data.docker_container.my_container.container_id
}

output "container_status" {
  value = data.docker_container.my_container.status
}

output "container_ip" {
  value = data.docker_container.my_container.ip_address
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Docker container.

### Read-Only

- `command` (List of String) The command used to start the container.
- `container_id` (String) The Docker container ID.
- `env` (List of String) Environment variables set in the container.
- `gateway` (String) The network gateway of the container.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `image` (String) The image used by the container.
- `ip_address` (String) The IP address of the container.
- `labels` (Map of String) User-defined key/value metadata.
- `state` (String) The state of the container.
- `status` (String) The status of the container (e.g., running, exited).
